ad_text: New Directions Youth & Family Services Sponsored Hiring Registered Nurses in Lockport and Randolph! Position Summary: Registered nurses are responsible for the provision of all health-related services to New Directions youth in the school and the residential program to promote wellness and create a healthy environment. Minimum Education/Qualifications/Skills - Current licensure in NYS as a Registered Professional Nurse (required) - Previous experience in pediatric nursing or a childcare setting (preferred) Position offers flexible working hours. Apply now at: https://fosteringgood.org/employment/
